sample.title: Simple AES Chat

sample.description: This template shows how the network component of CT2 can be used to create a simple encrypted chat.

replacement.value: This sample demonstrates the usage of the network sender and the network receiver.\line\line In the destination IP select an Destination IP adress where you want the message to be delivered.\line\line If you use two cryptool 2 instances and the same secret key you may send an AES 256 encrypted message from one PC to the other one.
